org.biohipi.image

Class BioHipiImageHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biohipi.image.BioHipiImageHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<BioHipiImageHeader>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<BioHipiImageHeader>

    public class BioHipiImageHeader
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<BioHipiImageHeader>
    The header information for a BioHipiImage. BioHipiImageHeader encapsulates universally available information about a biomedical image such as width, height, storage format, color space, patient id, patient name, etc.
    The org.biohipi.image.io package provides classes for reading (decoding) BioHipiImageHeader from both BioHipiImageBundle files and various standard image storage formats such as JPEG, PNG, NIfTI and DICOM.
    Note that this class implements the WritableComparable interface, allowing it to be used as a key/value object in MapReduce programs.

    • Field Detail

      • storageFormat

        private BioHipiImageHeader.BioHipiImageFormat storageFormat
        Format used to store image on HDFS

      • metaData

        private Map<String,String> metaData
        A map containing key/value pairs of meta data associated with the image. For example, this would be the correct place to store the image tile offset and size if you were using a HIB to store a very large image as a collection of smaller image tiles. Another example would be using this dictionary to store the source url for an image downloaded from the Internet.

      • addMetaData

        public void addMetaData(String key,
                        String value)
        Adds an metadata field to this header object. The information consists of a key-value pair where the key is an application-specific field name and the value is the corresponding information for that field.
        Parameters:
        key - the metadata field name, you may use BioHipiImageHeader.BioHipiKeyMetaData
        value - the metadata information

      • setMetaData

      • getMetaData

        public String getMetaData(String key)
        Attempt to retrieve metadata value associated with key.
        Parameters:
        key - field name of the desired metadata record, you may use BioHipiImageHeader.BioHipiKeyMetaData
        Returns:
        either the value corresponding to the key or null if the key was not found

        Parameters:

        Specified by:

      • readFields

        public void readFields(DataInput input)
                throws IOException
        Deserializes HipiImageHeader object stored in a simple uncompressed binary format using the DataInput interface. The first twenty bytes are the image storage type, color space, width, height, and number of color bands (aka channels), all stored as ints, followed by the meta data stored as a set of key/value pairs in JSON UTF-8 format.
        Specified by:
        readFields in interface org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        Writable.readFields(java.io.DataInput)

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(BioHipiImageHeader that)
        Compare method inherited from the Comparable interface. This method is currently incomplete and uses only the storage format to determine order.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable<BioHipiImageHeader>
        Parameters:
        that - another BioHipiImageHeader to compare with the current object
        Returns:
        An integer result of the comparison.
